name: Phun With Phasers
description:
Painstakingly crafted over upwards of 4 sessions, each 15-20 minutes long, when I should have been sleeping or doing something with my kids or whatever, I present to you, Phun With Phasers!

This is not the game I wanted to make for @S0phieH's #StarTrekJam but it is the game I was able to make :-) Also, another month completed for #OneGameAMonth 2016! w00t!

Code by me (and my dog): @RubyIsDog

Created with LibGDX
